required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of K-877 in Adult Patients With Fasting High Triglyceride Levels and Mild or Moderate Renal Impairment

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy and safety of K-877 in adult patients With Fasting High Triglyceride Levels ≥500 mg/dL and <2000 mg/dL and Mild or Moderate Renal Impairment.

primary_outcome.measure: Percent change of fasting triglyceride(TG) levels
primary_outcome.description: Percent change in fasting triglyceride(TG) levels from baseline to Week 12

secondary_outcome.measure: Percent change of fasting TG levels
Percent change in fasting HDL-C levels
Percent change in fasting LDL-C levels
Percent change in fasting non-HDL-C levels
Percent change in fasting Total Cholesterol levels

arm_group.description: K-877 or placebo comparator for 12 weeks
K-877 or fenofibrate comparator for 40 weeks
